paragraphs.body: Locke played tennis in college and was nationally ranked. He is currently a two handicap golfer and active on the charitable celebrity golf circuit in between roles.
paragraphs.text: Locke played tennis in college and was nationally ranked. He is currently a two handicap golfer and active on the charitable celebrity golf circuit in between roles.

paragraphs.body: Locke has a career spanning twenty-six years, beginning with a minor two year recurring role in the TV soap opera General Hospital in 1985. He served in an uncredited role in the movie Black Rain in 1989, and played the villain ninja/cyborg assassin in Robocop 3 in 1993. In 1999, Bruce was a series regular in Mortal Kombat Conquest, where he played the sorcerer, Shang Tsung. In 2006, Locke made seven appearances as a doctor in the NBC soap opera Passions. His latest big role came in a 2009 episode of Cold Case, and in 2010 in the season premiere of Psych.

In 1999, Bruce was a series regular in Mortal Kombat Conquest, where he played the sorcerer, Shang Tsung. In 2006, Locke made seven appearances as a doctor in the NBC soap opera Passions. His latest big role came in a 2009 episode of Cold Case, and in 2010 in the season premiere of Psych.
